text: Chinese Ambassador to the Federated States of Micronesia The Chinese ambassador in Palikir is the official representative of the government in Beijing to the Government of the Federated States of Micronesia. ==List of representatives== {| class="wikitable sortable" !| Diplomatic agrément/Diplomatic accreditation !| ambassador !| Chinese language :zh:中国驻密克罗尼西亚大使列表 !| Observations !| Premier of the People's Republic of China !| President of the Federated States of Micronesia !| Term end |- | | | |The governments in Palikir and Beijing established diplomatic relations. |Li Peng |John Haglelgam | |- | |Zhang Zai (PRC diplomat) |:zh:张再 |Concurrently with residence in Canberra (Australia).
